title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

This Part is intended to safeguard the general welfare of
the college community members and guests and to promote order and ease of
movement on the campus by supplementing the New York State Vehicle and Traffic

Law, which is in full force and effect on the campus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
583.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
